title: Challenger ahri border
body: Ive just got the challenger ahri border plus icon but the border isnt showing up in the loading screen?

replies.body: Im having the same problem, like I spent 250 tokens on this border and icon and it wont show up? lame.
u need to use the challenger ahri skin in order for it to show (border)

Sometimes things like borders take a little while to actually redeem to the account, and there were also some crafting issues around the time you posted (sorry for missing it then!). If it still hasn't come through, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
